name: Nutty Coconut Brunch Bread
ingredients: 2. tsp. coconut flavoring 1 cup flaked coconut
steps: Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan. Prehead oven to 325. Beat in large bowl the eggs, sugar, oil, and coconut
flavoring. Mix flour, soda, baking powder, and salt together. Add alternating the dry ingredients and buttermilk
to creamed mixture. Fold in nuts and coconut. Spoon into tube pan Bake at 325 for 1 1/4 hours.
Meanwhile, combine in saucepan, 1 cup sugar, 1/2 cup water, and 2 tablespoons butter. Bring to boil and boi
l for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add 1 teaspoons coconut extract. Pour hot syrup over top of warm
bread and allow to stand for about 4 hours before removing from pan.
Can also be baked in 3 (7 inch) pans for about 1 hour. Test to make sure its cooked through.
